item.title: Remembering in Whom We Have Trusted
item.description:
Remembering in Whom We Have Trusted by Elder Allen D. Haynie, Of the Seventy given in Session 6 of 185th Semiannual General Conference on Wed Sep 30 2015
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.
item.itunes:author: Elder Allen D. Haynie, Of the Seventy

item.title: A Living Prophet for the Latter Days
item.description:
A Living Prophet for the Latter Days by Elder Allen D. Haynie, Of the Seventy given in Saturday Morning of 193rd Annual General Conference on Fri Mar 31 2023
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.
